title: Where Is 'The Falcon and the Winter Soldier' Trying to Go? Plus, Some Listener Questions.
description:
Is 'The Falcon and the Winter Soldier' getting lost in the weeds by trying to be more than a buddy comedy (6:02)? Chris and Andy talk about that and then answer some listener questions about fan participation that shapes television shows (31:57) and exclusive live content potentially coming to streaming platforms (51:53).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
